member.name: T:OraclePermissionGeneratorWebServiceAPI.ITrackingDataLogger
member.summary: Defines methods to log tracking information regarding consuming of the web service.

member.name: M:OraclePermissionGeneratorWebServiceAPI.ITrackingDataLogger.Log(System.DateTime,System.String,System.String,OraclePermissionGeneratorWebServiceAPI.Containers.Location,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Logs tracking information.
member.param: The time the web service method was called.
The identifier of the user who called the method.
The name of the method that was called.
The physical location of the consumer of the web service.
The IPV4 address of the device consuming the web service.

member.name: T:OraclePermissionGeneratorWebServiceAPI.ISoapWebServiceApi
member.summary: Defines methods which expose the data interface layer of the Oracle Permission Generator application over a web service.

member.name: M:OraclePermissionGeneratorWebServiceAPI.ISoapWebServiceApi.AddUser(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a user into the data layer.
member.param: A unique identifier for the user.

member.name: M:OraclePermissionGeneratorWebServiceAPI.ISoapWebServiceApi.GetDefaultObjectOwner(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the default object owner for new object permission sets.
member.param: The authentication context of the web service consumer or user.
Tracking information of the web service consumer or user.
member.returns: The default object owner.

member.name: M:OraclePermissionGeneratorWebServiceAPI.ISoapWebServiceApi.SetDefaultObjectOwner(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the default object owner for new object permission sets.
member.param: The default object owner.
The authentication context of the web service consumer or user.
Tracking information of the web service consumer or user.

member.name: M:OraclePermissionGeneratorWebServiceAPI.ISoapWebServiceApi.GetObjectTypes(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of all object types in the data layer.
member.param: The authentication context of the web service consumer or user.
Tracking information of the web service consumer or user.
member.returns: The object types in the data layer.

member.name: M:OraclePermissionGeneratorWebServiceAPI.ISoapWebServiceApi.GetRoles(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of all roles in the data layer.
member.param: The authentication context of the web service consumer or user.
Tracking information of the web service consumer or user.
member.returns: The roles in the data layer.

member.name: M:OraclePermissionGeneratorWebServiceAPI.ISoapWebServiceApi.GetPermissions(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of all available permissions for the specified object in the data layer.
member.param: The object to return the permission for.
The authentication context of the web service consumer or user.
Tracking information of the web service consumer or user.
member.returns: The available permissions in the data layer.

member.name: M:OraclePermissionGeneratorWebServiceAPI.ISoapWebServiceApi.GetPermissionsForObject(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of all permissions on the specified object assigned to the specified role in the data layer. Note this method had to be renamed from the GetPermissions() method in the OraclePermissionGeneratorDataInterfaceLayer class, as WCF does not allow method overloading.
member.param: The object to return the permissions for.
The role to return the permissions for.
The authentication context of the web service consumer or user.
Tracking information of the web service consumer or user.
member.returns: The permissions for the object and role in the data layer.

member.name: M:OraclePermissionGeneratorWebServiceAPI.ISoapWebServiceApi.GetMasterRoleToUserMapCollection(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the master list of role to user mappings in the data layer.
member.param: The authentication context of the web service consumer or user.
Tracking information of the web service consumer or user.
member.returns: The master list of role to user mappings.

member.name: M:OraclePermissionGeneratorWebServiceAPI.ISoapWebServiceApi.AddObjectPermissionSet(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds an Oracle object permission set to the data layer.
member.param: The name of the object.
The type of the object.
The user who owns the object.
Specifies whether statements should be generated to add this object when generating Oracle scripts.
Specifies whether statements should be generated to remove this object when generating Oracle scripts.
The set of permissions for the object.
The authentication context of the web service consumer or user.
Tracking information of the web service consumer or user.

member.summary: Removes an Oracle object permission set from the data layer.
member.param: The name of the object.
The authentication context of the web service consumer or user.
Tracking information of the web service consumer or user.
